means: （南美洲和中美洲所产的）大鸟

4. 杓鹬凤冠雉 curassow钻水鸭 dabbling duck

mom is carrying skirt to place go by gently , her head follows the child's head and be together , on the meadow that looks attentively at in the child , be a curassow is umbriferous .妈妈提着裙摆轻轻走过去,她的脑袋跟孩子的脑袋并在一起,在孩子注视的草地上,是一只大鸟的投影。
curarine 筒箭毒碱, curassow 具角的, curarization 箭毒化

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: Anglicized form of Curaçao

means.word_mean: 1. large crested arboreal game bird of warm parts of the Americas having long legs and tails; highly esteemed as game and food
